name: obelisk (STARTECH-GAMES)
description:
Install instructions

1. EXTRACT THE FOLDERS

2. GET INSIDE THE RIGHT FOLDER

3. DOUBLE CLICK ON "project" game

GAME ISTRUCTION:

2 player game

player 1:

RIGHT ARROW - MOVE RIGHT

LEFT ARROW - MOVE LEFT

DOWN ARROW - STOP MOVING

player 2:

'd' - MOVE RIGHT

'a' - MOVE LEFT

's' - STOP MOVING
